org.fcrepo.kernel.services

Class RepositoryService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modeshape.jcr.api.JcrTools
      • org.fcrepo.kernel.services.RepositoryService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FedoraJcrTypes
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DatastreamService, NodeService, ObjectService, VersionService

    @Component
public class RepositoryService
extends org.modeshape.jcr.api.JcrTools
implements FedoraJcrTypes
    Repository-global helper methods
    Author:
    Chris Beer
